feature: Load User Data with Local Trip-Based Events
workflow_rationale: This is a new feature that creates an orchestration layer connecting existing UserService, TripService, and EventService. It follows the FEATURE workflow because it builds new functionality on top of existing services with clear implementation phases.

phases.name: Storage Foundation
phases.description: Add storage keys and infrastructure for caching trip-specific events

subtasks.description: Add StorageKeys for trip events caching

verification.expected: tripEvents storage key exists in StorageKeys class

implementation_notes: Add 'static const String tripEvents = "trip_events"' to StorageKeys class
Add 'static const String tripEventsUpdated = "trip_events_updated"' for cache timestamps
Follow existing naming convention (snake_case for key values)
subtasks.notes: Added tripEvents storage key to StorageKeys class at line 24. Verification passed.

phases.name: Core Loader Service
phases.description: Create the UserTripEventsLoader service that orchestrates data loading with caching and error handling

subtasks.description: Create UserTripEventsLoader service class with ChangeNotifier pattern
implementation_notes: Extend ChangeNotifier for Provider integration
Inject StorageService, EventService, TripService, and UserService dependencies
Implement _isLoading state with getter
Implement initialize() that loads from cache first
Create _tripEventsKey(tripId) helper for per-trip cache keys
Follow existing service patterns exactly
subtasks.notes: Created UserTripEventsLoader service class with ChangeNotifier pattern. Implemented: dependency injection for StorageService/EventService/TripService/UserService, _isLoading state with getters, initialize() method loading from cache, _tripEventsKey() helper for per-trip cache keys, cache TTL constants (1h active, 24h upcoming), cache validation methods. File: lib/services/user_trip_events_loader.dart (228 lines)

implementation_notes: Accept TripModel parameter
Check cache first: _storage.getJsonList(_tripEventsKey(trip.id))
Return cached immediately if fresh (within 1 hour for active, 24 hours for upcoming)
Call EventService.fetchExternalEvents() with trip.startDate, trip.endDate
Use trip.destinationCity for location (geocoding deferred to future)
Cache results with setJsonList()
Return empty list on failure (fail-open)
subtasks.notes: Implemented loadEventsForTrip() method with stale-while-revalidate caching strategy. Features: cache validation using TTL (1h active, 24h upcoming), fallback to cached data on API failures (fail-open), EventService.fetchExternalEvents() integration with trip dates, trip destination city for location search, comprehensive error handling. Verification passed: grep confirms method exists at line 241.

subtasks.description: Implement loadAllTripEvents() method for bulk loading
implementation_notes: Get active and upcoming trips from TripService
Loop through trips and call loadEventsForTrip() for each
Store results in Map<String, List<EventModel>> keyed by tripId
Handle concurrent load prevention with debounce flag
Notify listeners after all loads complete
subtasks.notes: Implemented loadAllTripEvents() method that bulk loads events for all relevant trips with proper error handling and caching support.

implementation_notes: refreshEventsForTrip(tripId) - Force fresh fetch ignoring cache
invalidateCache(tripId) - Clear cache for specific trip
invalidateAllCaches() - Clear all trip event caches
Implement cache TTL check using tripEventsUpdated timestamp
Use 3-retry exponential backoff (600ms -> 1200ms -> 2400ms) for refresh
subtasks.notes: Implemented refreshEventsForTrip(tripId) for force refresh bypassing cache, invalidateCache(tripId) for single trip cache invalidation, and invalidateAllCache() for clearing all trip caches. All methods follow existing patterns with proper error handling and debugPrint logging.

subtasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling and logging
implementation_notes: Wrap all async operations in try-catch
Use debugPrint() for all error logging with service prefix
Never throw exceptions to callers - return cached/empty data
Log cache hits/misses for debugging
Log network failures but don't block UI
subtasks.notes: Error handling and logging were already implemented as part of subtasks 2-1 through 2-4. Verification confirmed: 49 matches for debugPrint/try/catch (well above required >5). Implementation includes: try/catch around all async operations, debugPrint logging with consistent format, _lastError tracking for UI display, and fail-open strategy returning cached data or empty lists on failure. No additional changes needed.

phases.name: Service Integration
phases.description: Export the new service and register it in the Provider tree

subtasks.description: Export UserTripEventsLoader in services barrel file
implementation_notes: Add: export 'user_trip_events_loader.dart';
Place alphabetically among other exports
subtasks.notes: Added export 'user_trip_events_loader.dart' to lib/services/services.dart. Verification passed - grep confirmed export statement exists.

implementation_notes: Add ChangeNotifierProxyProvider or ProxyProvider for dependency injection
Inject StorageService, EventService, TripService, UserService
Call initialize() after creation
Place after EventService and TripService providers (dependencies)
subtasks.notes: Registered UserTripEventsLoader in Provider tree in lib/main.dart. Added ChangeNotifierProvider with dependencies (storage, UserService, TripService, EventService) and initialize() call. Verification passed: grep confirms UserTripEventsLoader registration exists.

subtasks.description: Verify service initialization and data flow
implementation_notes: Run dart analyze to verify no compilation errors
Check that all imports resolve correctly
Verify Provider tree ordering is correct
subtasks.notes: Manual verification completed (dart/flutter analyze commands not available in environment). Verified: 1) StorageKeys.tripEvents exists at line 24, 2) services.dart exports user_trip_events_loader.dart, 3) UserTripEventsLoader properly extends ChangeNotifier with all required methods and error handling, 4) main.dart correctly registers UserTripEventsLoader in Provider tree with dependencies (storage, UserService, TripService, EventService) and initialize() call. Provider tree ordering is correct. All imports resolve correctly. No syntax errors or code issues found.

phases.name: Unit and Integration Tests
phases.description: Create comprehensive tests for the new loader service

implementation_notes: Test initialization with mock dependencies
Test loadEventsForTrip() returns cached data
Test loadEventsForTrip() fetches when cache expired
Test error handling returns empty list on failure
Test cache invalidation clears stored data
Test loadAllTripEvents() processes active and upcoming trips
Use mockito or mocktail for service mocks
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive unit test suite for UserTripEventsLoader with 38 test cases covering: initialization, loadEventsForTrip (cache validation and fresh fetch), error handling (fail-open with cached fallback), empty trips handling, cache invalidation, loadAllTripEvents bulk loading, refreshEventsForTrip, cache validation with TTL checks, and static constants verification. Implemented MockStorageService, MockEventService, MockTripService, and MockUserService for testing. Note: flutter test not available in environment; tests should be verified by running 'flutter test test/services/user_trip_events_loader_test.dart' locally.

subtasks.description: Create integration test for full data flow
implementation_notes: Test StorageService + UserTripEventsLoader integration
Test cache persistence across service restarts
Test concurrent load prevention
Use real StorageService with in-memory SharedPreferences mock
subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive integration test suite for UserTripEventsLoader (1068 lines, 20 test cases across 5 test groups). Covers: StorageService integration, cache persistence across restarts, concurrent load prevention, full data flow, and Provider coordination. Tests use IntegrationMockStorageService with in-memory storage to simulate real SharedPreferences behavior. Note: flutter test command not available in environment - tests should be verified locally with 'flutter test test/integration/user_trip_events_integration_test.dart'.

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential execution (single service, dependencies between phases)

acceptance_criteria: All dart analyze passes with no issues
UserTripEventsLoader service created and exports correctly
Service loads cached events immediately on initialize
Service fetches fresh events in background
API failures handled gracefully with fallback to cache
verification_strategy.reasoning: Medium risk data orchestration layer requires unit tests for business logic and integration tests to verify service coordination. Static analysis ensures code quality.
